## Thenable interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Thenable<T, E = unknown> 
```

## Remarks

This interface purposely defines only the bare minimum needed for awaitable values and leaves out features like chaining of `.then()` calls and optional rejection callbacks as available for promises.
